channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Country Was Fake. But Its Land Grab in Bolivia Was Real.
item.description: Emissaries of the “United States of Kailasa,” led by a fugitive holy man, were deported after negotiating 1,000-year deals with Indigenous groups.

item.title: A new wildfire prediction AI model shows why data rules
item.description: Europe's leading weather forecaster ECMEF shows that adding additional data improves wildfire predictions, and that data trumps AI model complexity.

item.title: ‘Oh really? Oh s—.’ CEO reacts live to tariff-based stock plunge on earnings call
item.description: Company formerly known as Restoration Hardware flirts with 52-week low.

item.title: The Childish Tariff Formula That Will Reshape the Global Economy
item.description: Trump said repeatedly that the tariffs are “reciprocal,” but that’s not true. The rates were calculated using a childish formula based on trade imbala...

item.title: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee fires coach and director after investigation reveals one of their teenage athletes was sexually abused for years
item.description: Gary Colliander and Eileen Carey are no longer affiliated with the USOPC.

item.title: The NHL just struck a $7.7 billion deal with Rogers, which is more than double the previous media-rights contract they signed a decade ago
item.description: Rogers will have NHL rights through the 2037-38 season.

item.title: Eric Adams Will Run for NYC Mayor as an Independent
item.description: Mayor Eric Adams faced an uphill battle in the June 24 Democratic primary, which has drawn a crowded field of candidates. He will run for re-election ...

item.title: Israel Shifts Goal Posts in Gaza War
item.description: In pressing forward with its assault on the territory, Israel hopes to squeeze Hamas into releasing the remaining hostages. But other objectives have ...

item.title: Israel Shifts Goal Posts in Gaza War
item.description: In pressing forward with its assault on the territory, Israel hopes to squeeze Hamas into releasing the remaining hostages. But other objectives have ...

item.title: Joe DePugh, Pitcher Who Inspired Bruce Springsteen’s ‘Glory Days,’ Dead at 75
item.description: A gifted athlete, he gave a clumsy teenage Bruce Springsteen his first nickname, Saddie. Years later, the Boss returned the favor, memorializing him i...

item.title: Prince Harry Expresses ‘Relief’ Over Charity Commission’s Sentebale Investigation
item.description: A British regulator said it would examine concerns about Sentebale, the charity Harry co-founded, looking at its chair as well as its trustees.

item.title: The Country Was Fake. But Its Land Grab in Bolivia Was Real.
item.description: Emissaries of the “United States of Kailasa,” led by a fugitive holy man, were deported after negotiating 1,000-year deals with Indigenous groups.

item.title: ‘It Had Teeth’: A 3-Year-Old Discovers Ancient Treasure in Israel
item.description: While on a hike with her family, a child stumbled across a 3,800-year-old Egyptian amulet. It will go on display in an upcoming exhibition.

item.title: Live Updates: Wall Street Reels From Shock of Trump Tariffs
item.description: Stocks tumbled in the U.S., Asia and Europe. Allies and adversaries alike were weighing their responses.

item.title: Here’s why some companies have publicly defended their DEI commitment while others have scrapped their policies
item.description: The corporate DEI rollback is in full swing, but not everyone is taking part.
